rukus.text: O vi kred vi don charity provisions ni don vi tag ven kie tie ne est komerc ne nepotism ne intercession! disbelievers est des unjust

DI tie NE est ALI DI Him Viv DES ETERN. Neniam moment unawareness dorm overtakes Him! Al Him aparten cxio heavens cxio sur ter! Who intercede Him en accordance kun His vol? Li kon their preter their future Ne 1 ating any knowledge Li vol. His dominion encompasses heavens ter regul them neniam sxargx Him. Li est plej Alt des Great
tie ne est compulsion religi des tuj voj est nun distinct wrong voj! Anyone denunc diabl kred en DI grasped fort obligaci; unu neniam romp! DI est Hearer Omniscient
DI EST Lord DE those KRED; LI PLUMB them darkness into light As por those disbelieve their lords est their idols; ili plumb them light darkness - these est dwellers Infer; ili abide gxi forever
